title: Anri's Way
opening: Seeking the Lightsphere, Marth and his friends headed for the Tower of Thabes.

Thabes is an ancient city buried under the sands, along with many treasures. The legend of Thabes, city of illusion, lured many adventurous men to the desert. However, in the end... not one of them ever returned. As the sages once said... stay clear of Mamorthod, the desert of death. There lies the cursed Dark City.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Oh, it's just you.... You had me startled for a moment. Especially with that mask on you...

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Well... perhaps a little. Do you mean to fight like that?

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Jagen, where in the world are we...?

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: This is the path depicted in the Anri Saga. The first obstacle in Anri's Way: the Desert of Death. With its scorching sun, raging sandstorm, savage clansmen of the sands and wyverns that soar and dominate the skies. As the city of illusion shimmers in the distance, we can only stand and gaze... Or so the legend has it.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: So Anri came through here as well. And by himself, too...

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: That's right. Your ancestor and Altea's founder, King Anri... To save Princess Artemis, he set out on a journey to seek the Divine Blade Falchion.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: King Anri was strong. I wouldn't be able to cross through here alone. I'm truly grateful to those who offered to accompany me through this desert.

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: I think everybody wishes to follow you, sire. Everyone wants to be with you. Wherever you go, they will follow. That's what I believe. It's because of your kindness, sire.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: Thank you. I don't have Anri's power. But I have all of you. Wonderful companions like you, Kris. That's how I can keep going. Let's go, Kris.

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: Jake! What are you doing all the way out here...?

recruit-talk.speaker: Jake
recruit-talk.line: Is that you, Caeda? Hey, long time no see. I'm here to meet my beloved Anna.

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: Huh? Anna lives in a place like this?

recruit-talk.speaker: Jake
recruit-talk.line: Oh, you didn't know? Anna's running a secret shop out here. It's a tiny bit troublesome coming here, but y'know, love conquers all barriers! Your turn Caeda. What're you doing in the desert?

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: Listen, Jake. We're fighting for the peace of the continent again. Could you help us, like old times...?

recruit-talk.speaker: Jake
recruit-talk.line: I dunno, I kinda lost my ballista, so I doubt I'd be much use to you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: That's not true. You'd help us a lot just by being there...

recruit-talk.speaker: Jake
recruit-talk.line: Aw, shucks. How could I say no when you say it like that? I bet Anna's worried about the war too. Alrighty, I'll join you then.

end.speaker: Tiki
end.line: Mar-Mar!! It's been aaages. It's me, Tiki! I've wanted to see you for so long.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Huh... Tiki?! You came to welcome us? Oh, I see... you've been living with Lord Gotoh, haven't you?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Sire, do you know this little girl?

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Yes. This is Tiki, a companion of ours during the war. Tiki was a great boon to our cause. She mowed down legions of enemy dragons with her tremendous power.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: What?! This little girl did that...?

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: But you've certainly grown since last time. I'm glad to see you're well.

end.speaker: Tiki
end.line: Yeah... But I was so lonely. 'Cause you never came to see me...

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: I'm sorry. But I could never forget about you. I had intended to invite you back to Altea once things had calmed down.

end.speaker: Tiki
end.line: Mar-Mar... I... I love you!

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: ...Gotcha!

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Xa... Xane!!!

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: What the...?! T-the little girl is now a man!

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: Oopsy daisy. Took you by surprise, didn't I? Particularly you over there, newbie. I'm Xane. A friend of Marth's. Transformin' into other people's a special ability of mine. Hey princey, my Tiki impression was pretty darn tootin', wasn't it? Did I provide some comic relief? Well, shall we get goin'? You wanted to see Lord Gotoh, right?

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Xane, how do you know Lord Gotoh? Just who are you?

end.speaker: Xane
end.line: Well, lemme see. I don't think that really matters right now. Hey, put that jaw back in place and follow me.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Kris, I noticed you fighting with that mask on.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Yes. The desert sun was strong, but it acted as a shield. Nevertheless, I suppose there's little point in wearing it now.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: I see. Are you going to remove it then?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Yes. I think I shall.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Yes, that's probably a good idea.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: No. I'll keep fighting with it on.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: I-is that so...? Does it not bother you in any way?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Not at all. I can fight just fine with it on.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: I-I see. Well, if that's what you've decided then I have no problems with it.
